title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.4 - Administration and interpretation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.4 - Administration and interpretation

State Regulations

The State Civil Defense Director shall be responsible
for the Statewide administration and interpretation of the regulations
governing construction, maintenance and use of fallout
shelters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
502.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
